crisis.suggestion: Visit a nearby park or garden for some fresh air
crisis.benefit: Grounding in nature helps calm overwhelming emotions

crisis.suggestion: Call a crisis support line (988) or text HOME to 741741
crisis.benefit: Immediate emotional support from trained professionals

crisis.suggestion: Try the 5-4-3-2-1 sensory exercise (5 things you see, 4 you feel, 3 you hear, 2 you smell, 1 you taste)
crisis.benefit: Reduces overwhelming anxiety and brings you to the present moment

high.suggestion: Practice box breathing (inhale 4s, hold 4s, exhale 4s, hold 4s)
high.benefit: Calms the nervous system and reduces stress hormones

high.suggestion: Listen to calming instrumental music or nature sounds
high.benefit: Helps regulate emotions and provides comfort

high.suggestion: Try gentle yoga stretches or slow walking
high.benefit: Releases physical tension and improves mood

moderate.suggestion: Try journaling, drawing, or any creative activity
moderate.benefit: Helps process emotions and provides a healthy outlet

moderate.suggestion: Call a friend or family member for a chat
moderate.benefit: Reduces isolation and provides emotional support

moderate.suggestion: Try cooking, gardening, or organizing a space mindfully
moderate.benefit: Engages focus and provides sense of accomplishment

low.suggestion: Go for a bike ride, swim, or try a new sport
low.benefit: Boosts endorphins and improves overall well-being

low.suggestion: Take an online course or learn a new skill
low.benefit: Builds confidence and provides sense of progress

low.suggestion: Volunteer at a local organization or help a neighbor
low.benefit: Creates connection and sense of purpose

safe.suggestion: Plan a future trip or explore new places in your city
safe.benefit: Builds excitement and gives something to look forward to

safe.suggestion: Practice a hobby or start a creative project
safe.benefit: Provides flow state and personal satisfaction

safe.suggestion: Join a club, attend events, or meet new people
safe.benefit: Expands social circle and creates new experiences
